place.name: NORTH CARLTON
place.gazetteerText: CARLTON (North), a parish in the district and county of Lincoln, 3½ miles E by N of Saxelby r. station, and 5 NNW of Lincoln. Post Town, Saxelby, under Lincoln. Acres, 1,795. Real property, £2,500. Pop., 163. Houses, 27. The property is divided between two. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £35. Patron, the Bishop of Lincoln. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
